item.title: Hollywood Flashback: ‘Battle of the Network Stars’ Turned Celebs Into Gladiators
item.description: The ABC show pitted actors from the big three networks against one another, with Howard Cosell presiding over the spectacle.

item.title: Joshua Jackson Is “Not Holding [His] Breath” That ‘Doctor Odyssey’ Will Return
item.description: The series star’s comments come after The Hollywood Reporter confirmed that the ABC show would not be embarking on a second season, even as the network maintains it hasn’t been canceled.
